name: Penthouse The Manor
address: 2301 W, The Manor, My Dinh, My Dinh National Stadium, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Penthouse The Manor offers accommodation in Hanoi, 1.3 km from My Dinh Stadium and 3.8 km from Vietnam Museum of Ethnology. Guests benefit from free WiFi and private parking available on site.

There is a dining area and a kitchen equipped with microwave. A TV with satellite channels is provided. Other facilities at Penthouse The Manor include a seasonal outdoor pool.

Giang Vo Exhibition Center is 5 km from Penthouse The Manor, while Vietnamese Air Force Museum is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 23 km from Penthouse The Manor.
